UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-6.1.2-0.11-11.07.17-Milestone
UpdateList.description: Imported nadlabaks camera UI overhaul (looking really awesome now)|Wide camcorder profile support|Add 5-point multitouch module by nadlabak|Included CM4MM Updater app|Slightly tuned low memory killer parameters|Wifi fixed for some routers (no need to apply the Wifi hotfix anymore)|Unlock haptics now obey the general on-off/lenght/pattern settings (much more smoother now)|Torch high brightness mode fixed|Removed "Bootloader" option from reboot menu (rebooted to fastboot, which is not suitable for flashing sbf's)

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-6.1.2-0.10-11.07.07-Milestone
UpdateList.description: Proper ext4 module (supports ext2, ext3, ext4; preloaded)|ext2, ext3 modules included, not preloaded|New 07app2ext script included|openvpn support via tun.ko (preloaded)|cifs (e.g. for Windows shares) - not preloaded, but can be automatically|insmodded via CifsManager)|nls_utf8 module (iocharset=utf8 option for cifsmount; preloaded)|nfs support (included; not preloaded)|xt_multiport (to fix some iptables issues; preloaded)

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-6.1.2-0.09-11.07.05-Milestone
UpdateList.description: DSI error recovery module aka dsifix added (nadlabak/Nothize/Zewelor)|Removed now obsolete DSI workaround as dsifix.ko is included|New 5-step overclock module (Skrilax_CZ)|Optional 1% battery steps (CyanogenMod settings->User interface->Status bar) (GoodWin/nadlabak)|Over 100% battery reading fixed (nadlabak)|New simple 10overclock and default oc settings from cm7|AttributeCache clear added to prevent continuously growing system_server memory usage (nadlabak)|Load kernel modules earlier (nadlabak)|Interactive governor by default|Added low battery alert sound toggle (CyanogenMod settings->Sound settings)|Longer wifi rescan interval for less battery consumption while no known networks in range|ro.ringtone_query_wait_time set to 1500ms to fix custom ringtone not playing (nadlabak)|Added OR autoboot|Toggle2G updated
